description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Null Battles features online multiplayer with up to 16 players on 2 to 4 teams, zero gravity combat, procedurally generated levels, and retro style art and sound.
description.short: Null Battles features online multiplayer with up to 16 players on 2 to 4 teams, zero gravity combat, procedurally generated levels, and retro style art and sound.
